Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add AI-powered bulk upload feature for company census imports

## New Feature: Bulk Upload
- Upload Excel/CSV files with company and employee census data
- Google Gemini AI automatically parses and structures the data
- Creates company, employees, and benefit elections in one operation
- Flexible format handling - works with various column names and structures

## Files Added
- apps/web/src/app/api/bulk-upload/route.ts - API endpoint with AI parsing
- apps/web/src/app/companies/bulk-upload/page.tsx - Upload UI component
- apps/web/.env.example - Environment template with Gemini API key
- BULK_UPLOAD_GUIDE.md - Complete documentation and usage guide

## Files Modified
- apps/web/package.json - Added xlsx@0.18.5 and @google/generative-ai@0.21.0
- apps/web/src/app/companies/page.tsx - Added "Bulk Upload" button
- apps/web/.env.local - Added GEMINI_API_KEY
